mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adoption_application (adoption_id, applicant_id, message, contact, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{adoption_id}, #{applicant_id}, #{message}, #{contact}, #{status}, #{create_time}, #{update_time})
mapper.select: SELECT aa.*, acc.username as applicant_username, acc.avatar as applicant_avatar, a.pet_name, a.pet_type FROM adoption_application aa LEFT JOIN account acc ON aa.applicant_id = acc.id LEFT JOIN adoption a ON aa.adoption_id = a.id WHERE aa.id = #{id}

SELECT aa.*, acc.username as applicant_username, acc.avatar as applicant_avatar FROM adoption_application aa LEFT JOIN account acc ON aa.applicant_id = acc.id WHERE aa.adoption_id = #{adoptionId} ORDER BY aa.create_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM adoption_application WHERE adoption_id = #{adoptionId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM adoption_application WHERE adoption_id = #{adoptionId} AND applicant_id = #{applicantId}
mapper.update: UPDATE adoption_application SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
